These people have more severe signs and symptoms than people with only one mutation, and features of the condition appear in childhood.",GHR,spinocerebellar ataxia type 3
What are the treatments for spinocerebellar ataxia type 3 ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of SCA3:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Spinocerebellar
